p: With the ability to access this unique set of nanoemulsions, we performed a systematic study to identify how emulsion surface charge affects cellular uptake ( Fig. 6A). It is known that the size, zeta potential, and surface chemistry of nanoparticles dictate cell uptake in vitro, 78, 110 but these experiments have primarily been performed on hard nanomaterials ( e.g. gold nanoparticles 78, 111, 112), micelles 113â€“ 115 or liposomes. 10, 116, 117 Results have shown that nanoparticle composition and cell type are also important factors in cell uptake, making studies on nanoemulsions an important addition to this field of study.
